html:
7.1.20  10:57 am   how the heck is your music so good and nostalgic teach me your secrets king of weirdness

      basically the secret is to be a sponge. actually that's step 1. be a sponge for a while and then one day when you can't take it anymore you can turn into a firehose

7.1.20  10:54 am   is astrology real why do people believe in it?

      it's like fanfic, about earth. so those who are familiar with earth will recognize many of the themes

7.1.20  10:44 am   How many pants should I wear?

      as many as you can

7.1.20  10:38 am   any advice? 

      yes, just make sure you go at the right pace

7.1.20  10:35 am   How do you come up with all these great answers for questions 

      i have a book of bad answers. so, usually what i do is i just take a bad answer and then change it. Also, a very important step not to forget, is to check the book again to make sure the changed answer is not also in the book

7.1.20  10:07 am   How do you finish a song that you start? I always lose interest.

      how you thought about ending it (the song)

7.1.20  10:04 am   why do you like music?

      because of how bad it is

7.1.20  9:24 am   can the amount of videos you plan to make accurately be described in human numbers?

      no

7.1.20  9:22 am   How are you so incredibly skilled at making something so random and funny at the same time 

      the whole secret is: seriousness

7.1.20  9:07 am   how many letters are in the answer to this question?

      four

7.1.20  9:06 am   How long is a piece of string?

      oh, several half dozen inches or so

7.1.20  8:49 am   top tips for naming my son gilgamesh? things I should look out for?

      first just go ahead and name him that, and then if that doesn't work you'll wanna go ahead and try naming him that again. but just make sure it definitely didn't work the first time, so you don't do it twice

7.1.20  8:26 am   did u ever find out if it is legal to make laws?

     not just legal, it's encouraged

      if so which laws did u make, if any?

      i made a law that lets you make 2 laws

7.1.20  8:02 am   I heard that you'reearning 3D animation, is it true??

      that would certainly be convenient

7.1.20  7:40 am   what would be the best question to ask?

      only you can decide. go for a world record

7.1.20  7:09 am   What do you think is the meaning of life ? 

      everything

7.1.20  7:04 am   With lyricism, how do I get confidence in my abilities? 

      open up a blank text document and just start going bonkers. do this every day. several times a week. even, several weeks per time, if you get what i'm saying

7.1.20  6:49 am   What is a society

     i'm not sure

     and would you consider yourself one

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

7.1.20  6:38 am   do you like music?

      it's ok

7.1.20  6:24 am   why is my mirror staring at me

      because you are staring at it

7.1.20  6:17 am   How hard is editing?

      it depends how bad the original footage was

7.1.20  6:12 am   How did you learn music theory

     i get to make it up. that is just a privilage we all have as earth citizens

      and how long did it take you?

     i've been doing it all my life. because we are making it up, you never have to stop

7.1.20  6:05 am   Are you working on any new videos or music

      so much more

7.1.20  5:59 am   It's been a long time and a lot of hard work, but the thing is finally done. I'm scared to post it, though, because I'm afraid people will hate it and throw rocks at me. How to quell this fearsome doubt?

      you can't

7.1.20  5:41 am   why am i trash

      that's because of how fresh and clean you are

7.1.20  5:23 am   What do you do for fun?

      walk between 2 locations that are absolutely not considered walking distance

7.1.20  5:23 am   Why do you do what you do?

      seems like common sense really

7.1.20  4:14 am   Have you ever considered the idea of a band with only yourself as a member?

     only for recordings. not for live performances

      How do you think it could go down in history?

     well, just being a 1 person band is not very notable. this is quite common and normal. to go down in history, it would have to be for another reason

7.1.20  4:13 am   Are you working on any thing new

      yes, everything

7.1.20  4:12 am   What is the best shape to cut a pizza?

      torus

7.1.20  4:08 am   In the outro of "I did a bad thing" does you doing a strange thing have anything to do with everything being pink, or are they 2 completely different situations? 

      i thought there was cause and effect implied, but i've never thought about it the other way until you said. i guess it is possible for it to be a coincidence

7.1.20  3:22 am   I lost the motivation to play music. How might I find it or create it again

      if you have no motivation to play music then i would recommend doing something else which you do have motivation for. you will be happier that way for sure

7.1.20  3:16 am   Do you have any recommendations for writing bass lines? Yours are always so musical without straying from holdin' it down!

      as long as you love songs, you are gonna be fine. make sure the bass player loves the song

7.1.20  2:53 am   why does your music make me feel happy?

      that could be a reflection of the happy world we all live in

7.1.20  2:38 am   What do you think about Sweden?

      it's very good

7.1.20  2:11 am   did you really go to New caanaan?

      yes

7.1.20  2:10 am   Is water my best friend?

      if not, it wants to be

7.1.20  1:09 am   Are you 3 raccoons in a trench coat

      i am 3 raccoons with no trench coat

7.1.20  12:47 am   how cool are you?

      just enough to get through the day

7.1.20  12:43 am   Can you describe your favorite fruit to me

      yes, it's very shapely

7.1.20  12:43 am   Does music do music

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

7.1.20  12:42 am   Thoughts on Bangladesh?

      long lost cousin of pakistan





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

6.30.20  11:51 pm   how can i start making music?

      impossible to predict until you've done it, even then you still won't know

6.30.20  11:37 pm   what's your opinion on thunderstorms?

      calms me down

6.30.20  11:35 pm   what is the saddest chord progression?

      4min, 1min

6.30.20  10:57 pm   Hey, I've just started writing songs, do you start with the lyrics then produce/find the instrumental, or vice versa? Or is it a case to case basis?

      well, i think there is a big piece of the picture you are totally forgetting about, which is the music of the lyrics. so, not the lyric, not the instrumental, but the melody the voice sings ..... you didn't mention that part ... anyway i do that part at the same time as the lyrics. and the chords are usually there at the same time also

6.30.20  10:49 pm   What do you do if you can't sleep?

      try to become even more awake

6.30.20  10:21 pm   Has science gone to far? Or has it not gone far enough?

      not far enough, but it's going at a pretty good pace

6.30.20  10:19 pm   Can an opinion be wrong?

      no, but it can be too right

6.30.20  9:50 pm   do you speak english

      sort of
